articles.author: Mehul Reuben Das
articles.title: Up and Away: SpaceX is set to launch up to four satellites for the EU in 2024 - Firstpost
articles.description: Having worked with NASA, Elon Musks SpaceX will now launch satellites for the European Space Agency, or ESA. SpaceX is planning two Falcon  rocket launches, each carrying two Galileo satellites
articles.content: The European Space Agency (ESA) is on the verge of securing a tentative deal with SpaceX for the launch of up to four satellites in the coming year. This development comes in light of recent setbacks… [+1171 chars]
